void nextlimit::rf_sdk::Group::getNodes ( std::vector< NodeAccesor > &  nodes)

getNodes:

Get the list of Nodes grouped under THIS group.

Parameters:
[out]nodes/ Vector of NodeAccesors NodeAccesor is a wrapper to a Node object which type could be any of Emitter, Daemon, Mesh, Camera, Joint, Object and Group. To obtain the sdk object wrapped inside the NodeAccesor use the methods getType and asRFCamera, asMesh ... See NodeAccesor for more details.
